{{About|the skin pack that covers the 2022/23 season|the skin pack that covers the 2023/24 season|LALIGA Skin Pack}}{{Exclusive|Bedrock}}
{{Infobox skin pack
| skins = 80
| release = September 19, 2022
| price = {{minecoin|490}}
}}[[File:LaLiga22-23.jpg|thumb|Key art]]

'''LaLiga Skin Pack'''<ref>{{Cite|url=https://www.laliga.com/en-GB/news/laliga-enters-adventure-block-game-space-with-minecraft|title=LaLiga enters adventure block game space with Minecraft|date=September 26, 2022|website=laliga.com}}</ref> is a [[skin pack]] that crosses over with {{Wikipedia|La Liga}}, the top men's professional football division of the Spanish football league system. It was created by Blockception and includes 80 skins of La Liga players wearing {{Wikipedia|Kit (association football)|kits}} for the 2022/23 season. At some point, it was delisted.
